channel.title: Making a working scoreboard
channel.description: i have a scoreboard added but when i click on it it doesnt display and thing whats the matter?

item.title: Making a working scoreboard
item.dc:creator: @i0b_0n i0b 0n
item.description:
@i0b_0n wrote:

An easy way to add high scores (made by me)
What needed to edit;client.java
Step 1 , add this ;

if(objectID == 3192){
sendQuest("@dre@High scores", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Train Attack to:”, 8145);
sendQuest(“1.Wield weapons”, 8147);
sendQuest(“2.More % of hit some one”, 8148);
sendQuest(“Bronze/Iron weps - 1.”, 8149);
sendQuest(“Steel weps - 5.”, 8150);
sendQuest(“Black weps - 10.”, 8151);
sendQuest(“Mithril weps - 20.”, 8152);
sendQuest(“Adamant weps - 30.”, 8153);
sendQuest(“Rune Weps - 40.”, 8154);
sendQuest(“GraniteM - 50. (with 50 str)”, 8155);
sendQuest(“Dragon Weapons - 60.”, 8156);
sendQuest(“Abbysal Whip - 70.”, 8157);
sendQuest(“LALLALAA.”, 8158);
sendQuest(“NUMBER 8 - MEEEE.”, 8159);
sendQuest(“NUMBER 9 - ZEZIMA;”, 8160);
sendQuest(“NUMBER 10.”, 8161);
sendQuest("", 8162);
sendQuest("", 8163);
sendQuest("", 8164);
sendQuest("", 8165);
sendQuest("", 8166);
sendQuest("", 8167);
sendQuest("", 8168);
sendQuest("", 8169);
sendQuest("", 8170);
sendQuest("", 8171);
sendQuest("", 8172);
sendQuest("", 8173);
sendQuest("", 8174);
sendQuest("", 8175);
sendQuest("", 8176);
sendQuest("", 8177);
sendQuest("", 8178);
sendQuest("", 8179);
sendQuest("", 8180);
sendQuest("", 8181);
sendQuest("", 8182);
sendQuest("", 8183);
sendQuest("", 8184);
sendQuest("", 8185);
sendQuest("", 8186);
sendQuest("", 8188);
sendQuest("", 8189);
sendQuest("", 8190);
sendQuest("", 8191);
sendQuest("", 8192);
sendQuest("", 8193);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
SendMessage(“MADE BY I0B 0N”);
}

Step 2:
makeGlobalObject(####, ####, 3192, -1, 10);//highscores
(instead of #### ADD COORDS)
